collectible.title: Mitakihara City Orchestra Concert Ticket
collectible.subtitle: A ticket to the Mitakihara City Orchestra, featuring Kyousuke the violinist.
collectible.text: Hey, ~name~, I just got this concert ticket for one of my friends, but they had to cancel at the last minute. It'd be a shame for this ticket to see my friend Kyousuke live in concery go to waste. I certainly plan on going, and I would like to see you there...
